meanings.definition: The act or art of applying colors.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed learning about colorings in art class.
meanings.sent2: The colorings on the canvas were vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they experimented with different colorings on their drawings.
meanings.sent4: Her colorings on the walls of her room transformed the space into a cheerful haven.
meanings.sent5: The colorings of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: The result or product of coloring.
meanings.sent1: The colorings of the painting were admired by all who saw it.
meanings.sent2: The colorings of the dye on the fabric were uneven.
meanings.sent3: The colorings of the cake frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The colorings of the leaves in autumn create a beautiful tapestry of reds and golds.
meanings.sent5: The colorings of the rainbow in the sky brought a smile to her face.

meanings.definition: A substance used to give color to something.
meanings.sent1: She added different colorings to the icing to make it bright and fun.
meanings.sent2: The colorings in the paint were non-toxic and safe for children.
meanings.sent3: The colorings in the makeup palette were perfect for creating a dramatic look.
meanings.sent4: The colorings in the food dye transformed the cake into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The colorings in the fabric dye made the shirt a vibrant shade of blue.
